attributes.action: cease all aid to Sudan for 6 months and expel Sudan's ambassador
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the appalling treatment of British teacher Gillian Gibbins it is only right to send a strong message to Sudan by witholding aid for 6 months and expelling the Sudanese ambassador.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
